alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 12 at 2:56AM MDT until July 17 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 115 possible. * WHERE...Lower Washington County. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
